Text: RE List of Credit Teamit goes Thanks Flavia Negrete Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Monday March AM To Gil Mercy Cc Bailey Susan Subject List of Credit Team Mercy Since there are so many new Credit people that we Legal do not know it would be very helpful if you could provide me with a new list of the Credit Team and their phone numbers The last list we have is dated Thanks

RE Market Risk Meeting Today Kevin Prestopst Conference room ECS has been reserved for Houston participants Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February AM To Gorny Vladimir Hayden Frank Gil Mercy Black Tamara Jae Presto Kevin M Cc Subject Market Risk Meeting Today Kevin Presto Importance High Hi The Meeting with Kevin Presto has been scheduled for today at pm Houston Time The dial in information is as follows Dial In Number Freephone within the US Pin Number Mercy please reserve a conference room for those participants in Houston Thanks jm Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

Baby Copeland has arrivedJAMES ERINS LITTLE BUNDLE OF JOY HAS ARRIVED NAME Chase Alen Copeland A healthy boy WEIGHT lbs oz DATE TIME pm Mommy baby and daddy are doing fine PS See message below from proud parents Hey everybody we just wanted to share the first official picture of the Copelands new addition Please feel free to share with other friends and family just in case weve accidentally missed someone God Bless Visitor password chaseroo webnurserybabypageaspURLIDWBIYT
